execution_plan.description: Compute, per category, the number of inactive products and total products; keep only categories where inactive > active.
execution_plan.query: SELECT categories.id AS s1__category_id, categories.name AS s1__category_name, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE products.is_active = false) AS s1__inactive_count, COUNT(products.id) AS s1__total_count FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.id GROUP BY categories.id, categories.name HAVING COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE products.is_active = false) > COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE products.is_active = true)
